biotools.summary: EcoSP database is an integrated repository of bacterial O-antigens and K-antigens (Escherichia coli), which collects comprehensive information, including serotypes, coding region sequences, glycosyltransferases, structures, and biosynthetic pathways of K-/O- antigens.

bioschemas.name: EcoSP
